thread.title: Marie Couch

author: Marie Couch
title: Marie Couch
text: We had our Seatcraft row of 4 power recliners (with power head rests too!) from 4Seating.com for two years and one of the chairs started to act up. After a couple days, the chair stopped operating all together. I contacted Customer Service and Richard Valdez responded. He helped me narrow down the problem to an electronic part, confirmed it was the right one and promptly sent it out at a reasonable price. This level of service is almost impossible to find these days and I thought I was going to be stuck with an inoperable recliner. Richard, you've made us customers for life...Thank you!!
